testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters email "env:RUDDERSTACK_EMAIL"..........................passed And the user enters password "env:RUDDERSTACK_PASSWORD".....................passed And the user submits the login form.........................................passed Then the user should land on the Connections page...........................passed

testcase.name: Login fails with invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters email "env:RUDDERSTACK_EMAIL"..........................passed And the user enters password "wrongpassword"................................passed And the user submits the login form.........................................passed Then the error message "Wrong email or password." should be displayed.......passed

testcase.name: Send Event and Measure Webhook Delivery Time
testcase.system-out: Given I log in to RudderStack...............................................passed And I read and store the data plane URL.....................................passed And I read and store the write key from the HTTP source.....................passed And I send an event using the HTTP API......................................passed Then I go to the Webhook destination's Events tab...........................passed Then I wait for and measure the delivery time for the event.................passed

testcase.name: API returns error for invalid write key
testcase.system-out: Given I log in to RudderStack...............................................passed And I read and store the data plane URL.....................................passed And I use an invalid write key..............................................passed And I go to the Webhook destination's Events tab............................passed When I send an event using the HTTP API.....................................passed
